mapper.insert:
insert into webbeds_daolv_match_lab (daolv_hotel_id, daolv_hotel_name, dotw_hotel_code, dotw_hotel_name, webbeds_latitude, webbeds_longitude, daolv_latitude, daolv_longitude, webbeds_address, daolv_address, webbeds_tel, daolv_tel, webbeds_country, daolv_country, diff_meter, diff_level, name_match, address_match, tel_match, score, multi_match) values
(#{item.daolvHotelId},#{item.daolvHotelName},#{item.dotwHotelCode},#{item.dotwHotelName}, #{item.webbedsLatitude},#{item.webbedsLongitude},#{item.daolvLatitude},#{item.daolvLongitude}, #{item.webbedsAddress},#{item.daolvAddress},#{item.webbedsTel},#{item.daolvTel},#{item.webbedsCountry}, #{item.daolvCountry},#{item.diffMeter},#{item.diffLevel},#{item.nameMatch},#{item.addressMatch}, #{item.telMatch},#{item.score},#{item.multiMatch})

insert into webbeds_daolv_match_lab_2 (daolv_hotel_id, daolv_hotel_name, dotw_hotel_code, dotw_hotel_name, webbeds_latitude, webbeds_longitude, daolv_latitude, daolv_longitude, webbeds_address, daolv_address, webbeds_tel, daolv_tel, webbeds_country, daolv_country, diff_meter, diff_level, name_match, address_match, tel_match, score, multi_match) values
(#{item.daolvHotelId},#{item.daolvHotelName},#{item.dotwHotelCode},#{item.dotwHotelName}, #{item.webbedsLatitude},#{item.webbedsLongitude},#{item.daolvLatitude},#{item.daolvLongitude}, #{item.webbedsAddress},#{item.daolvAddress},#{item.webbedsTel},#{item.daolvTel},#{item.webbedsCountry}, #{item.daolvCountry},#{item.diffMeter},#{item.diffLevel},#{item.nameMatch},#{item.addressMatch}, #{item.telMatch},#{item.score},#{item.multiMatch})
